phrase.value: Always ask for my user name and password
Auto login until I logout explicitly
Delete data and close my account

Are you sure you want to delete?

Exceed maximum recipient email count or email address incorrect

Exceed maximum bcc email count or email address incorrect

You will receive password recovery instructions shortly if your email address is registered.
Incorrect validation code, please enter again.
Sign in to start your session
You do not have permission to access %s.
You do not have permission to add the record.
You do not have permission to delete the record.
No distinct column values for SQL:
You do not have permission to edit the record.
No report or charts are available for this page.
Your account contains personal data that you have given us. This page allows you to download or delete that data.
Deleting this data will permanently remove your account, and this cannot be recovered.
Use this page to detail your site's privacy policy.
Data has been changed by other user. Click [Reload] to retrieve the changed data (your data in the form will be overwritten) or click [Overwrite] to overwrite the changed data.
Registration succeeded. An email has been sent to your email address, please click the link in the email to activate your account.
You cannot add or update a record because the foreign key value does not exist in the master table '%t'
You cannot delete a record because related records exist in the detail table '%t'
Registration email for user '%u' has been re-sent
Failed to re-send register email for user '%u' has failed
Session for user '%u' has been reset
Failed to reset session for user '%u'
Login retry count for user '%u' has been reset
Failed to reset login retry count for user '%u'
An error occured while communicating to the server.
An internal error has occurred while processing your request.
Your session will expire in %s seconds. Click OK to continue your session.
Password for user '%u' has been set as expired
Failed to set password for user '%u' as expired
The current user (%c) is not authorized to assign the user ID (%u).
The current user (%c) is not authorized to assign the parent user ID (%p).
The current user (%c) is not authorized to insert the record. Master filter: %f
Your browser is not supported by this page
The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
The uploaded file was only partially uploaded
Failed to write file to disk
A PHP extension stopped the file upload
The uploaded file exceeds the post_max_size directive in php.ini
Total length of file names exceeds field length
User level name for user level -1 must be 'Administrator'
User level name for user level -2 must be 'Anonymous'
User level ID must be integer
User level name for user level 0 must be 'Default'
User defined user level ID must be larger than 0
User defined user level name cannot be 'Anonymous', 'Administrator' or 'Default'
User profile is corrupted. Please logout and login again
The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.
The request requires valid user authentication.
You are not permitted to perform the requested operation.
The requested resource could not be found. Please verify the URI and try again.
The request method is not supported for the requested resource.
Unexpected condition encountered preventing server from fulfilling request.
The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
